title: Get Started
description: Click on the 'Get Started' button to initiate the resume-building process.

title: Fill in Details
description: Provide your personal details, education, work experience, and skills in the respective forms.

title: Customize Layout
description: Utilize the drag-and-drop feature to customize the layout and order of your resume sections.

title: Preview and Download
description: Preview your finished resume, make any necessary edits, and then download or share it directly.
